bibl.title: Pogrebal'nye ob''edinenija v Ptolemeevskom Egipte. [Funeral Organizations in Ptolemaic Egypt.]
bibl.note: Brings together information from different archives on the funeral activities of the three burial guilds (Hawara, Thebes and Memphis) and several social and religious associations of Ptolemaic Egypt. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Apollinaria M. Frydmann, Pogrebal'nye ob''edinenija v Ptolemeevskom Egipte. [Funeral Organizations in Ptolemaic Egypt.]

Brings together information from different archives on the funeral activities of the three burial guilds (Hawara, Thebes and Memphis) and several social and religious associations of Ptolemaic Egypt. - Avec résumé en anglais.
